identified-content.person: PIERCE, ASHLEY REYNOLDS (ASHLEY REYNOLDS VON PERFALL)

block.p: Ashley Reynolds Pierce, the daughter of Melinda Fuller vanden Heuvel and Frank E. Pierce III, both of Manhattan, was married in Manhattan yesterday to Alexander von Perfall, the son of Elisabeth Delerue of Geneva and Baron Franz von Perfall of Munich. Judge E. Leo Milonas, the retired chief administrative judge of the Appellate Division of State Supreme Court in Manhattan, officiated at the Knickerbocker Club.

Mrs. von Perfall is a director of marketing for RCA Red Seal, the classical label of the RCA Music Group in Manhattan. She graduated with honors from Connecticut College. Her mother is the vice chairwoman of the National Hospice Foundation in Arlington, Va., and a member of the board of the National Center for Learning Disabilities in Manhattan. Her father is a retired member of the New York Stock Exchange.

Leo Milonas, the retired chief administrative judge of the Appellate Division of State Supreme Court in Manhattan, officiated at the Knickerbocker Club.

Mrs. von Perfall is a director of marketing for RCA Red Seal, the classical label of the RCA Music Group in Manhattan. She graduated with honors from Connecticut College. Her mother is the vice chairwoman of the National Hospice Foundation in Arlington, Va., and a member of the board of the National Center for Learning Disabilities in Manhattan. Her father is a retired member of the New York Stock Exchange.

The bride's stepfather, William J. vanden Heuvel, was the United States deputy representative at the United Nations from 1979 to 1981. He is now of counsel to the law firm of Stroock & Stroock & Lavan in Manhattan and the chairman of the Franklin and Eleanor Roosevelt Institute in Hyde Park, N.Y. The bride's stepmother, Gail Plautz, is the vice president for photography at CBS Television in New York.

Mr. von Perfall was until August the manager of international talent acquisition and development in Manhattan for BMG Entertainment International, a unit of Bertelsmann, the German media conglomerate. Next month he is to become the senior project manager for the Bertelsmann Content Network, also in Manhattan, which oversees online syndication. He is also a partner in Brave New World Management in Manhattan, an international recording artist development and consulting business. He graduated from the University of San Francisco.

His father is a partner and the managing director of KanAm Realty, a real estate investment company in Munich and Atlanta. The bridegroom's stepmother, Katharina von Perfall, is a partner in Achenbach Art Consulting in Munich.
